parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: A reduplicated and prolonged form of prao; contracted from perao; to traffic, i.e. Dispose of as merchandise or into slavery.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 2nd Person Singular
str2: Yours, thy, thine. From su; thine.

parse: Noun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Noun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: A thing done, a deed, action; a matter, an affair. From prasso; a deed; by implication, an affair; by extension, an object.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Noun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To deceive, lie, speak falsely. Middle voice of an apparently primary verb; to utter an untruth or attempt to deceive by falsehood.

parse: Noun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Conjunction
str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Noun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
